sentence.Network_en: Your plan of going abroad is an audacious decision.
sentence.Network_cn: 你计划出国是一项大胆的决定.

sentence.Network_en: It was audacious of him to tell me a downright lie.
sentence.Network_cn: 他真有勇气,敢向我撒了个弥天大谎.

sentence.Network_en: He described the plan as ambitious and audacious.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把这项计划说成是雄心勃勃,敢于冒险.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... attenuate ? v. 变薄,变弱, 削弱 audacious ? adj. 大胆的，愚勇的 audition n. 试听.
BEC中级词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... asset n. 财产；（复）资产 audacious a. 大胆的，鲁莽的 audience n. 听众；倾听；接见.
(aggressive)、适应性强的 (adaptable)、主动的,活跃的 (active)、善于分析的(analytical)、有理解力的(apprehensive)、大胆的,有冒险精神的(audacious)、和蔼可亲.

list.abs: the most audacious move of the race so far is also , potentially , the most self-destructive .迄今为止，总统竞选中最为大胆的举动也可能是最具自我毁灭性质的。
Her audacious attitude helps her win the contest ., 她大胆的态度帮助她赢得了比赛.
Your plan of going abroad is an audacious decision ., 你计划出国是一项大胆的决定.
...the crowing of cocks and the barking of dogs鸡鸣犬吠monstrously audacious狗胆包天mere trash狗屁不通

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin audax, audac- 'bold' (from audere 'dare') + -ious

encyclopedia.content: Audacious是一款Linux下的音乐播放器，与其它播放器的不同之处在于，它除了支持UTF-8字符集之外，还提供其它字符集的支持，这样能比较好的解决中文乱码的问题。

entry.def: Someone who is audacious takes risks in order to achieve something.

example.ex: ...an audacious plan to win the presidency.
example.tran: 为当选总统而制订的大胆计划

sentences.sentence: "the most bodacious display of tourism this side of Anaheim"- Los Angeles Times
"the modern world with its quick material successes and insolent belief in the boundless possibilities of progress"- Bertrand Russell

means.word_mean: 3. disposed to venture or take risks;

sentences.sentence: "audacious visions of the total conquest of space"
"an audacious interpretation of two Jacobean dramas"
"the most daring of contemporary fiction writers"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表形容词,"有……特征的,多……的,易……的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: auda大胆+acious有……特征的,多……的,易……的→adj.大胆的,愚勇的
sag知道+acious多……的→知道很多的→睿智的
ver真实+acious多……的→很多真实→可靠的
sequ跟随+acious多……的→跟随太多的→盲从的
ten拿住+acious多……的→拿住不放→固执的
rap夺+acious多……的→夺的多的→强夺的
viv生命+acious多……的→多生命的→活泼的
sal跳+acious有……特征的,多……的,易……的→见到女人就跳起来
